id.description: Unique identifier for the meeting engagement.

properties.description: Additional properties related to the meeting engagement.

hs_activity_type.description: Type of activity associated with the meeting.

hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids.description: IDs of all business units assigned to the meeting.

hs_at_mentioned_owner_ids.description: IDs of owners mentioned in the meeting.

hs_attachment_ids.description: IDs of attachments associated with the meeting.

hs_attendee_owner_ids.description: IDs of owners who are attendees in the meeting.

hs_body_preview_html.description: HTML version of the meeting body preview.

hs_body_preview_is_truncated.description: Flag indicating if the body preview is truncated.

hs_created_by_user_id.description: User ID of the creator of the meeting.

hs_createdate.description: Date and time when the meeting was created.

hs_engagement_source_id.description: ID of the source of the meeting engagement.

hs_follow_up_action.description: Follow-up action related to the meeting.

hs_gdpr_deleted.description: Flag indicating if the meeting is deleted due to GDPR.

hs_i_cal_uid.description: Unique identifier for the meeting in iCalendar format.

hs_internal_meeting_notes.description: Internal notes related to the meeting.

hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date and time when the meeting was last modified.

hs_meeting_calendar_event_hash.description: Unique hash for the meeting in the calendar event.

hs_meeting_change_id.description: Change ID associated with the meeting.

hs_meeting_created_from_link_id.description: ID of the link from which the meeting was created.

hs_meeting_external_url.description: External URL associated with the meeting.

hs_meeting_location.description: Location where the meeting took place.

hs_meeting_location_type.description: Type of location where the meeting took place.

hs_meeting_source_id.description: ID of the source of the meeting.

hs_merged_object_ids.description: IDs of merged objects related to the meeting.

hs_modified_by.description: User who last modified the meeting.

hs_object_id.description: Object ID associated with the meeting.

hs_product_name.description: Name of the product associated with the meeting.

hs_queue_membership_ids.description: IDs of queues the meeting is associated with.

hs_scheduled_tasks.description: Scheduled tasks related to the meeting.

hs_unique_creation_key.description: Unique key associated with the creation of the meeting.

hs_unique_id.description: Unique ID associated with the meeting.

hs_updated_by_user_id.description: User ID of the user who last updated the meeting.

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_follower.description: IDs of users following notifications for the meeting.

hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollow.description: IDs of users who have unfollowed notifications for the meeting.

hs_user_ids_of_all_owners.description: IDs of all owners associated with the meeting.

hubspot_owner_assigneddate.description: Date and time when the owner was assigned to the meeting.

hubspot_owner_id.description: ID of the owner associated with the meeting.

hubspot_team_id.description: ID of the team associated with the meeting.

hs_all_owner_ids.description: IDs of all owners associated with the meeting.

hs_all_team_ids.description: IDs of all teams associated with the meeting.

hs_all_accessible_team_ids.description: IDs of all teams that have access to the meeting.
